item.title: Hosting a website on your ATProto PDS
item.description: I built a thing called atpage, it publishes websites to an ATProto PDS and provides a handy viewer tool. You can find it here. Have you ever wanted to host a fully-fledged website on your ATProto PDS? No? Too bad, it’s gonna happen anyway. Disclaimer: I’m not an ATProto expert, I may very well be doing nasty stuff, please do not emulate! How it works In ATProto, objects can be uniquely identified by an AT URI, made up of three components:
